channel.title: The December Update
channel.description:
You may have saw the [url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/index.php/Thread/28607-Introducing-The-New-Crossbow-Model/?pageNo=1']crossbow update[/url] that Chon posted. We originally had two game updates planed, but decided it was better to merge them into one big update for December. We historically have been all about surprise updates, but now we want to be more open to show people that we are making progress, and to hopefully build some excitement for the December update. So throughout this month I'll be posting previews of the coming features.
[b]Weapon Drag[/b] First up we added weapon drag. It's a seemingly small feature, but I think it adds a lot. You can set how much sway you have. So you can blow it out if you love it, or turn it to zero if you hate it. There also is an editable amount of weapon bob when you walk. [img]https://i.imgur.com/kWJvRwM.gif[/img]
[b]New Egon Model[/b] We made a new Egon model. It is very similar to the last one, but more polished and without the deleted back faces. [img]https://i.imgur.com/y7zvWwk.jpg[/img]
[b]Gman Arms[/b] We created some Gman arms, so when you select him in MP the arms are accurate. He also no longer explodes into HEV gibs :stuck_out_tongue: [img]https://i.imgur.com/QvAEcmX.jpg[/img]
[b]Bug Fixes[/b] -Fixed Steam Cloud -Flashlight is now brighter and has a wider radius! -Fixed satchel detonation to be faster and not switch mouse buttons on last satchel -Fixed the MP5 grenade spawning from then center of the screen when fired -Score persist on leaving and rejoining a MP match
That's just a quick sample. I'll be back through out the month to show off some new stuff that you guys/gals will hopefully find more and more interesting!

item.title: The December Update
item.dc:creator: Fitne_Por
item.description:
I’m wondering if you could potentially slip in various little code for existing BM npc with each update to give mappers more options when using them. By that I mean little things, such as adding Hammer inputs and outputs to various NPCs to enable them to walk around when they’re not fighting, or disabling ranged attacks so certain NPCs would have to close in to melee (such as HECU, Bullsquids, or Gargs). Surely wouldn’t be too hard to add small bits of code, they wouldn’t interfere with the existing setups in the current BM maps either. You wouldn’t have to implement all the improvements at once, maybe one piece of code at a time.

P.S. Besides that, have you planned any improvements to the NPC coding in future updates, probably in anticipation of Xen NPCs?
